trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control.

On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, you access the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> uses standard <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> methods to manipulate the collection.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a specific property value exists in the collection.

Additionally, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the index of any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> object within the collection.

Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.

When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.

Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
Adds a column style to the collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to add.
The index of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
Adds an array of column style objects to the collection.
An array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> objects to add to the collection.
Clears the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> objects.
Occurs when a change is made to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection"></xref>.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection"></xref> contains a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> associated with the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.

To get a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.

Pass the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> to return the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for a specific column.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> exists before invoking the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove the item.
If you need to know the index of a particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> associated with the desired <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
`true` if the collection contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.

Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection"></xref> contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified name.
The caption of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> is set with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A> property.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> exists before invoking the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove the item.
If you need to know the index of a particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName"></xref> of the desired <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
`true` if the collection contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection"></xref> contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> exists before invoking the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove the item.
If you need to know the index of a particular <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
The desired <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
`true` if the collection contains the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the index of a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine if a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> exists.
If so, and you need the index of the element within the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to find.

The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection"></xref> or -1 if no corresponding <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> exists.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> associated with the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> is created using a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> can be returned using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.PropertyDescriptor%2A> property.

To get the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> for a specific data source, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.GetItemProperties%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> class.

Pass the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection.Item%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection> to return a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor> for a specific column.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> associated the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> at a specified index.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the index of any element in the collection.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to return.
The specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified name.
The column header of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> can be set explicitly by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A> property.
By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.HeaderText%2A> is set using uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> property value.
The comparison between column headers and the value to look for is not case-sensitive.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to retrieve.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified column header.
Gets the list of items in the collection.
An <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> containing the collection items.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.CollectionChanged"></xref> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data event.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection"></xref>.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> exists in the collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to remove from the collection.
Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> with the specified index from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection"></xref>.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> exists in the collection.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to determine the index of any element in the collection.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to remove.
Sets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> for each column style in the collection to `null`.
Copies the collection to a compatible one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref>, starting at the specified index of the target array.
The one-dimensional <xref href="System.Array"></xref> that is the destination of the elements copied from collection.
The array must have zero-based indexing.
The zero-based index in the array at which copying begins.
array is `null`.
index is less than zero.
array is multidimensional.
-or-
The number of elements in the is greater than the available space from index to the end of array.
The type of the cannot be cast automatically to the type of array.
Gets the number of elements contained in the collection.
The number of elements contained in the collection.
Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
`false` in all cases.
Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection"></xref>.
The object used to synchronize access to the collection.
Returns an enumerator for the collection.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> for the collection.
Adds an object to the collection.
The object to be added to the collection.
The value can be `null`.
The index at which the value has been added.
value cannot be cast to a .
Clears the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> objects.
Determines whether an element is in the collection.
The object to locate in the collection.
The value can be `null`.
`true` if the element is in the collection; otherwise, `false`.
Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified object in the collection.
The object to locate in the collection.
The value can be `null`.
The zero-based index of the first occurrence of the value parameter within the collection, if found; otherwise, -1.
This method is not supported by this control.
The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.
The object to insert into the collection.
Always thrown.
Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
`false` in all cases.
Gets a value indicating whether the collection is read-only.
`false` in all cases.
Gets the element at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the element to get.
The element at the specified index.
An operation attempts to set this property.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to remove from the collection.
value cannot be cast to a .
Removes the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> at the specified index from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection"></xref>.
The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to remove.
